Sequence Information.Source: amino acid SUBSTITUTION, bovine cathelicidin, animal-derived, natural derivatives

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is 84.62% similar toIndolicidin. L=P=W: 23%, R: 15%.Activity: Active against Gram+ B. subtilis IFO 3513 (MIC 50 ug/ml), S. aureus IFO 12732 (MIC 25 ug/ml), and Gram- E.coli IFO 12734 (MIC >100 ug/ml). Warning:  other bacteria not tested.In vitro toxicity: 3% hemolysis relative to 50 uM Ind at 100% hemolysis after 0.5 h.Structure:  CD spectrum in methanol available (see ref).
